Articles.Content:
Hey everyone, I just thought I\'d have a fireworks exhibition in KSP to celebrate the upcoming release of 0.15.

This was of course a manned mission of the utmost importance, which unfortunately cost the life of many Kerman to reach this level of perfection.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_aHoP-E1wYA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I\'m sorry I couldn\'t get the video to be smoother... I hope you can enjoy this anyway ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I should probably mention I used some radial SRBs from the NovaPunch pack, as well as stock SRBs (both cfg edited to maximize explosion potential).

Holy crap my ears!!! ???

But I love it! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
